articles.description: Manchester United have been strongly linked with Jack Grealish over the past year in the transfer window but the Aston Villa captain has had a cheeky response to recent reports
articles.content:
Jack Grealish could not resist a light-hearted Bruno Fernandes joke as rumours continue to swirl over a move to Manchester United.
Ole Gunnar Solskjaer would love to snap up the Aston Villa captain,… [+1793 chars]
